examples.description: takes in arguments of an array and an element and returns true if the array includes that element, false if it does not.
examples.full_description: #using_include takes in arguments of an array and an element and returns true if the array includes that element, false if it does not.

examples.description: takes in an argument of an array and returns the sorted array.
examples.full_description: #using_sort takes in an argument of an array and returns the sorted array.

examples.description: takes in argument of an array and returns that same array with the contents reversed.
examples.full_description: #using_reverse takes in argument of an array and returns that same array with the contents reversed.

examples.description: takes in argument of an array and and returns the first element in the array
examples.full_description: #using_first takes in argument of an array and and returns the first element in the array

examples.description: takes in argument of an array and and returns the last element in the array
examples.full_description: #using_last takes in argument of an array and and returns the last element in the array

examples.description: takes in argument of an array and and returns the size, or length, of the array
